name: Ortho
description:
Ortho is a level-based 3D platformer that uses an orthographic camera perspective in order to trick your brain. You control a Purple rectangular prism and your goal is to get from the green platform to the red platform. You may turn your camera 90° at any time, which may change your perception of the level.

Ortho is the first game I've ever developed and although it's a small project I'm quite proud of it. I hope you'll enjoy playing it as much as I did creating it!

*Ortho is currently only available for Windows*
